schedule.content: A vibrant, eye-catching photorealistic or cinematic image of an exquisitely brewed, rare and unique tea. The tea is presented in a beautiful, sophisticated porcelain teacup, meticulously placed on an elegant surface. The background features a stylized, cozy, and luxurious interior, evoking the atmosphere of a magical hidden shop or a personal treasure discovery. Volumetric, soft light bathes the scene, highlighting the rich colors of the tea and the intricate details of the cup, creating an inviting and exclusive ambiance. Shot with an 8k camera, wide angle, capturing a sense of refined elegance and the allure of something truly special.

schedule.content: Photorealistic and cinematic style. A beautiful, steaming cup of vibrant 'Morning Charge' tea, prominently centered. Golden, volumetric sun rays dramatically pour over the cup, creating an energetic and invigorating morning glow. Fresh, bright ingredients like mint, lemon slices, and ginger are artfully arranged around the cup, emphasizing natural energy. Soft, diffused lighting illuminates the scene. Captured with an 8K camera, wide-angle lens, shallow depth of field, emphasizing a productive and bright start to the day.

schedule.content: Captivating photorealistic and cinematic visual, 8k, wide angle. Volumetric and soft lighting. A seamless, dynamic infographic-style composition illustrating the "Hand to Hand" journey of a pristine auto part. The scene clearly depicts interconnected stages: professional hands meticulously receiving and inspecting the part with precision, organized high-tech warehousing, expert protective packaging, and the final careful delivery to a satisfied customer's vehicle. Emphasize transparency, unwavering quality, and human care throughout the entire logistics process in a clean, modern, and efficient environment. Subtle branding accents.

schedule.content: Photorealistic cinematic 8k wide-angle shot, infused with volumetric and soft light. A humorous 'automotive rebirth' scene: A cheerful, eccentric 'car doctor' (a middle-aged mechanic in a pristine white lab coat, wearing oversized glasses and holding a wrench like a surgical tool, giving a triumphant thumbs-up) proudly stands next to a gleaming, newly 'revived' classic car. A single, perfectly preserved car part (e.g., a clean engine component) is prominently displayed on a small tray nearby, symbolizing its successful 'transplant'. The background subtly hints at an organized auto parts yard. The overall mood is optimistic, eco-conscious, and celebrates smart savings, embodying 'The patient will live!'

schedule.content: Cinematic photorealistic, 8k, wide angle, volumetric lighting. A humorous split-screen visual demonstrating significant economic benefit. On the left, a dramatically distressed person with an empty, tattered wallet, reacting in disbelief to an absurdly high price tag for a "new car part". On the right, the same person, now beaming with joy and relief, holding a thick, full wallet and a stack of cash, proudly pointing to a significantly lower price tag for "our quality used car part". The background subtly suggests a local, slightly rustic setting, hinting at Tsibino. The image powerfully conveys the theme: "Compare and Save! Discover your winnings by choosing us in Tsibino!"

On the right, the same person, now beaming with joy and relief, holding a thick, full wallet and a stack of cash, proudly pointing to a significantly lower price tag for "our quality used car part". The background subtly suggests a local, slightly rustic setting, hinting at Tsibino. The image powerfully conveys the theme: "Compare and Save! Discover your winnings by choosing us in Tsibino!"

input_data.description: Key visual for social media post

result_data.finalImagePrompt: A person relaxing comfortably on a plush sofa in a cozy, warm living room, holding a steaming cup of aromatic tea. They are browsing a vibrant online tea store on a laptop or tablet. The screen displays an array of diverse loose-leaf teas: green, black, oolong, pu-erh, and exotic blends with ingredients like dried fruits and flower petals. Scattered around are subtle hints of global tea origins and brewing accessories. Photorealistic, cinematic, soft, warm volumetric light filtering through a window, 8k, wide-angle lens. Key visual for social media post.

scenes.visual_description: A person relaxing comfortably on a plush sofa in a cozy, warm living room, holding a steaming cup of aromatic tea. They are browsing a vibrant online tea store on a laptop or tablet. The screen displays an array of diverse loose-leaf teas: green, black, oolong, pu-erh, and exotic blends with ingredients like dried fruits and flower petals. Photorealistic, cinematic, soft, warm volumetric light filtering through a window, 8k, wide-angle lens.

result_data.final_video_prompt: A 30-second heartwarming and inviting video advertisement for an online tea store. The video opens with a quick montage of fast-paced urban life, transitioning to a weary individual seeking peace. This person then finds solace on a plush sofa in a cozy, warm living room, holding a steaming cup of aromatic tea while browsing a vibrant online tea store on a laptop or tablet. The screen prominently displays an array of diverse loose-leaf teas: green, black, oolong, pu-erh, and exotic blends with ingredients like dried fruits and flower petals. The video concludes with a close-up of the person taking a blissful sip, a contented smile, with subtle hints of global tea origins and brewing accessories in the background. A clear call to action with the website logo appears. Photorealistic, cinematic, soft, warm volumetric light filtering through a window, 8k, wide-angle lens, emphasizing comfort, discovery, and tranquility. Key visual for social media post.
